# Getting Started

This guide helps you get started quickly.

## Prerequisites

Before you begin, read the [User Manual](./user-manual.md).

## API Setup

Configure your API credentials as described in the [API Guide](./api_guide.md).

For authentication details, see [API Guide - Authentication](./api_guide.md#authentication).

## Next Steps

- Complete the setup
- Test your configuration
- Read the [full manual](./user-manual.md#getting-started)
